remarks: Membership in a contracted interval.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
icccntri.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
icccntri.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
icccntri.3 $e |- R e. RR+ $.
icccntri.4 $e |- ( A / R ) = C $.
icccntri.5 $e |- ( B / R ) = D $.
icccntri $p |- ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> ( X / R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) $.
